errors.error_description: The installation command `pip install dist-utils` will fail because the package name is misspelled; it should be `distutils`.
correction_candidates: Correct the package name to `distutils` in the `pip install` command.
Change the command to `pip install setuptools` since it includes distutils.
Correct the command to `python -m pip install distutils`.
errors.golden_answer: Correct the package name to `distutils` in the `pip install` command.
